filmai.title: Titanic
filmai.body: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
filmai.author: James Cameron

filmai.title: The Godfather
filmai.body: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
filmai.author: Francis Ford Coppola
